intro: Psychotria pyrrotricha, commonly known as the red-veined psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its striking red veins on its dark green leaves, which give it a distinctive appearance. It produces small, white flowers that are clustered in dense inflorescences. Psychotria pyrrotricha is often found in humid, shaded environments such as rainforests and undergrowth areas.
